title: 15+ Odisha Smallest Wonders GK and Quiz | infoXodia - Odisha GK
description: Explore our engaging quiz about Odisha smallest general knowlege question and answer, including districts, rivers, wildlife sanctuaries, and more. Test your knowledge and learn fascinating facts about the smallest entities in Odisha. Deep-dive into the amazing odisha gk and odia quiz, test your knowledge!

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest river in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: The Budhabalanga River is one of the smaller rivers in Odisha and is the smallest also, flowing through the Mayurbhanj district.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest district in Odisha by area?
quizzes.ansDescription: Jagatsinghpur is the smallest district in Odisha by area, covering just 1,759 square kilometers.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest lake in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: Anshupa Lake is the smallest fresh-water lake in Odisha, located in the Cuttack district of Odisha.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest national park in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: Nandankanan National Park is the smallest national park in Odisha, located at Bhubaneswar Khordha.This is famous for its zoo and botanical garden.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest temple in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: Mukteswara Temple is one of the smaller temples in Odisha, known for its exquisite architecture. And this temple present at Bhubaneswar.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest village in Odisha by area?
quizzes.ansDescription: Raghurajpur is the smallest village in Odisha by area, famous for its Pattachitra art. And this village present in Puri district of Odisha.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest district in Odisha by population?
quizzes.ansDescription: Deogarh is the smallest district in Odisha by population, with a total population of 3,12,520.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest dam in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: Mandira Dam is one of the smaller dams in Odisha, located in the Sundargarh district.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest railway station in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: Rairangpur Railway Station is one of the smaller railway stations in Odisha, serving the Mayurbhanj district.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest district in Odisha by literacy rate?
quizzes.ansDescription: Malkangiri is the smallest district in Odisha by literacy rate, with a lower literacy percentage compared to other districts of Odisha.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest district in Odisha by number of villages?
quizzes.ansDescription: Deogarh is the smallest district in Odisha by the number of villages present in it, with fewer villages compared to other districts.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest national highway in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: NH-203 is one of the shortest national highways in Odisha, connecting Bhubaneswar to Puri.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest block in Odisha by area?
quizzes.ansDescription: Hinjili is one of the smallest blocks in Odisha by area, located in the Ganjam district.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest railway line in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: The railway line between Koraput and Jeypore is one of the shorter railway lines in Odisha, connecting two key towns.

quizzes.question: Which is the smallest waterfall in Odisha?
quizzes.ansDescription: Joranda Falls is one of the smaller waterfalls in Odisha, located in the Simlipal National Park.
